title: ASCII Game Engine
description: An ASCII art game engine built in C++ from the ground up. Powered by ncurses.

title: ConsciousDB
description: A C++ DBMS from scratch with included unit testing via GTest.

title: Atomic
description:
A full stack application made using Flask, React (TypeScript), MongoDB, and GCP.
Uses NLP to create a schedule matching the inputted goals of a user. Goals and progress tracking can be shared as if it were a social media post with other users.

title: Tag Team
description: A powerful yet lightweight collaborative notes app. Built on GCP using Flask, MongoDB, React, and GPT-4.

title: A Comparative Study of ML Classifiers for Detecting Financial Fraud
description: A research paper on the use of AI in financial fraud detection. Wrote while under the mentorship of professor Giovanna Maria Dimitri.

title: Session
description: A Flutter app using Firebase that tracks study habits and rewards them with points.

title: Market Portfolio Algorithmic Trading
description: A Jupyter notebook using pandas and numpy to analyze and predict stock prices, building a portfolio of securities with yfinance data.

title: Cheat Sheet
description: Customizable macro board with computer vision made with Python and OpenCV.

title: Boggle
description: A Java implementation of the Boggle game with a GUI.

title: NatureReads
description: An R package for data processing and visualization of the naturecounts dataset used by Birds Canada.
